type: type of the item that was lost
description: details about the item. may include comments about it
documentTransferDate: date when document was created taht concluded details about this item
foundDate: ISO date when the item was found
issueNumber: id of the item lost in database record from file
whereStored: name of the city where the item is being held right now
whereFound: name of the city where the item was found
voivodeship: voivodeship name of the place where the item was found
status: either "pending" or "returned" depending if the item returned to whe owner
